name: Dungeon Rampage (jocolloman)
description:
This is my entry for Trijam #147. The theme was "Just destroying stuff". Final dev time was 3:35. The majority of that time was spent scripting and building a menu system. I learned a lot about Unity's UI features and am happy with the results. I wasn't able to finish a combat system which was a little disappointing.

I hope you enjoy the game!

Attributions
  • Underworld Theme and Fanfare - Jocolloman
  • Menu System - Jocolloman
  • Scripting - Jocolloman
  • Map created with Captain Coder's Dungeoneering Kit
Textures
  • Wall Texture - rubberduck 
  • Floor Texture and Ceiling Texture - Cethiel 
  • Granite, Cherry Wood Veneer, Pitted Rust- Textures from FreePBR.org
Sprites
  • Weapon Sprites - Ravenmore
  • Armor Sprites - Zabin
  • Rest Sprite - J.W. Bjerk
3D Models
  • Weapon Statue Model - Anthony Myers
  • Armor Statue - Daniel Andersson
  • Chest Model- Skeleton64
  • Barrel Model - Mastahcez
Font
  • Dubstep Dungeon Font - Darrell Flood
